title: Check Compliance with New Tax Law
description: A business owner wants to know how a newly enacted tax law will affect their business and what changes they need to make.

tasks.description: Research the specifics of the new tax legislation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reads and understands the new law's provisions.

tasks.description: Analyze the business's current operations to see how they are impacted by the new law.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies specific areas of the business affected by the changes.

tasks.description: Provide the client with a summary of the impacts and a list of recommended actions to ensure compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent delivers a clear, actionable report to the client.
